mapper.insert: MERGE INTO MOVIE_CAST mc USING (SELECT #{person_id} AS person_id, #{movie_id} AS movie_id FROM DUAL) src ON (mc.person_id = src.person_id AND mc.movie_id = src.movie_id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET mc.character_name = #{character_name}, mc.cast_order = #{cast_order} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (person_id, movie_id, character_name, cast_order) VALUES (#{person_id}, #{movie_id}, #{character_name}, #{cast_order})
mapper.select: SELECT person_id FROM MOVIE_CAST WHERE movie_id = #{movie_id} ORDER BY cast_order

SELECT p.person_id, p.person_name, p.profile_path, mc.character_name, mc.cast_order FROM MOVIE_CAST mc JOIN PERSON p ON mc.person_id = p.person_id WHERE mc.movie_id = #{movie_id} ORDER BY mc.cast_order
